Paperback

An Ad-Free Comic/Manga Reader for iOS

iPad support

Friendly layout with a robust double spread chapter reader for iPad.

Plugin support

Paperback has support for loading third-party plugins by which you can add more content.

No advertisements

Unlike other not to be named apps and websites, this is a fully ad-free experience.
